B1 twelve: a dozen eggs This recipe makes three dozen cookies. Could you get me half a dozen (= six) eggs when you go to the supermarket?informal I've spoken to him dozens of (= many) times, but I still don't know his name! The refugees arrived by the dozen/in their dozens (= in large numbers).
More examplesFewer examplesMost people would be hard-pressed to name more than half a dozen members of the government.He sent a dozen roses to his betrothed.Most office buildings have dozens of air ducts and vents.There are dozens of different dyes to choose from.Books like this are a dime a dozen.
